sub_fields.label: Container Width
sub_fields.name: container_width
sub_fields.instructions:
Full - Full width of the screen
Contained - Add space on the sides of the content.

sub_fields.instructions: Select the display properties for the background image.

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: If placing the box on a dark background select light text.

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
You can update the data fro this block from the 'Option' page on the sidebar to the left.
Use the rest of the fields to define the layout of this block.
